Class PNGDataAccess

java.lang.Object
ch.supsi.dataaccess.image.PNGDataAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageDataAccess
public final class PNGDataAccess extends Object implements ImageDataAccess
Provides functionality to read and write PNG image files. Implements a Singleton pattern and uses ThreeChannel converter for color handling.
See Also:
  • DataAccessFactory
  • ImageDataAccess

    • read

      public WritableImage read(String path) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: ImageDataAccess
      Reads an image file from the specified path and processes it into a WritableImage.
      Specified by:
      read in interface ImageDataAccess
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the image file to read
      Returns:
      a WritableImage object representing the processed image
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file

    • write

      public WritableImage write(WritableImage image) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: ImageDataAccess
      Writes a WritableImage to a file at the specified path.
      Specified by:
      write in interface ImageDataAccess
      Parameters:
      image - the WritableImage object to be written to the file
      Returns:
      the WritableImage object that was written
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while writing the file
